channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 01/24/2024 # [New Feature] Preferred Response Language: Now you can set the default response language in the “Agent Information” menu. SeaChat will ensure the quality of your assistant’s responses. [Bugfix] Webchat Widget Preview: fix color mismatch bug in webchat widget preview.
